text:
Mourad Medelci (30 April 1943 – 28 January 2019) was an Algerian politician. He was Minister of Foreign Affairs from 2007 to 2013. He was President of the Constitutional Council of Algeria from 2013 until his death in 2019. He was born in Tlemcen, Algeria.
Medelci died on 28 January 2019 in Algiers from a cerebral hemorrhage, aged 75.
